example2: I saw a pig on the farm.
I saw an elephant at the zoo.
I saw a tiger in the jungle.
I saw a bear in the forest.
I saw a giraffe at the zoo.
I saw dolphins in the ocean.
Blue whales are the largest animals.
I saw a crocodile in the river.
I go to school on Monday.
Friday is the last school day.
I wake up in the morning.
I eat lunch in the afternoon.
I go home in the evening.
I want to be a doctor.
North is up on the map.
South is down on the map.
The sun rises in the east.
The sun sets in the west.
